user.title: YOLO + LLM Vision
user.description: Configure your YOLO detection sidecar. LLM Vision fields appear only when that integration is installed.

data_description.sidecar_url: URL of the YOLOv8 Docker sidecar, e.g. http://192.168.1.50:8000
data_description.confidence_threshold: Minimum confidence to accept a detection (0.1 – 1.0)
data_description.detection_classes: Which COCO object classes should trigger a detection. Person and dog are common for security cameras. Note: deer is not a standard COCO class — use horse as a close proxy.
data_description.draw_boxes: Overlay coloured bounding boxes on the camera snapshot for each detection
data_description.save_annotated_image: Save the annotated image to the Home Assistant /media folder
data_description.notify_service: Full service name, e.g. notify.mobile_app_phone or telegram_bot.send_message
